laboratory_examinations.findings: Bibasilar atelectasis; Heart size within upper limits of normal; 5 cm simple-appearing cyst in lower pole of right kidney; extensive diverticulosis from mid transverse colon to sigmoid colon; no free fluid or free air.

Extensive diverticulosis in sigmoid colon; multiple associated lymph nodes not enlarged; no secondary signs of bowel wall thickening or fat stranding; bladder, uterus, rectum grossly unremarkable; no free fluid or free air.
